item.description:
"PHASE 11"

For those of you who are Widowed a little longer and would like a more sociable setting to meet people.
Gatherings will take place monthly at a central location for a movie, dinner or cocktail.
Please let me know via email if you would like to attend a "PHASE 11" gathering in the future.

Everyone will pay his/her own way.

group.name: The Boston Area Young Widow and Widowers Group

item.name: PHASE 11 - Social Gathering
